706748f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shepherd Avenue - Pitkin Avenue
706748f-a.text:
44O Shepherd Avenue, west side, 125 ft., south of Pitkin Avenue,
(right, not shown) showing the home of Petor Lo Re in 1922.
May 22, 1922.
W. B. Vernam
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
